description: A table to store information relating to documents attached to a specimen.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPEC_ATTCHD_DCS_ID
columns.description: This item links to document records which are attached to the specimen.

columns.name: SPEC_ATTACHED_CMTS
columns.description: This item stores comments associated with document records attached to the specimen.
